title: Senior Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our AI team. The ideal candidate will have experience in machine learning, deep learning, and statistical analysis.
education_requirements: MS in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
responsibilities: Develop machine learning models for business applications
Analyze large datasets to extract insights
Collaborate with engineering teams to deploy models
Present findings to stakeholders

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our frontend team to build modern, responsive web applications. We need someone with strong React skills and eye for design.
education_requirements: BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience
responsibilities: Develop user interfaces using React
Ensure responsive design across devices
Collaborate with designers and backend developers
Write clean, maintainable code

title: Backend Software Engineer
description: We're seeking a Backend Software Engineer to work on scalable enterprise applications. Experience with Java and microservices architecture is essential.
education_requirements: BS in Software Engineering or Computer Science
responsibilities: Design and develop backend services
Implement microservices architecture
Optimize application performance
Mentor junior developers

title: Python Developer
description: Looking for a Python developer to work on web applications and APIs. Experience with Django or FastAPI is highly preferred.
education_requirements: BS in Computer Science or related field
responsibilities: Develop web applications using Python frameworks
Design and implement REST APIs
Work with databases and caching systems
Collaborate with frontend developers

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our DevOps team to manage CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation. Experience with containerization and orchestration is required.
education_requirements: BS in Computer Science, IT, or related field
responsibilities: Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Manage containerized applications
Implement infrastructure as code
Monitor system performance and reliability

title: AI Engineer
description: We are seeking an AI Engineer to develop and deploy artificial intelligence solutions. The ideal candidate will have experience in building AI systems and working with large language models.
education_requirements: MS in Computer Science, AI, or related field
responsibilities: Design and implement AI algorithms and models
Develop intelligent systems and applications
Optimize AI model performance and scalability
Collaborate with research teams on AI innovations
Deploy AI solutions in production environments

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Join our computer vision team to develop cutting-edge image and video analysis systems. Experience with deep learning for computer vision applications is essential.
education_requirements: MS in Computer Vision, Computer Science, or related field
responsibilities: Develop computer vision algorithms for real-world applications
Implement object detection and recognition systems
Work with image and video datasets
Optimize models for real-time performance
Research and implement state-of-the-art CV techniques

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We're looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to build and deploy ML systems at scale. The role requires strong software engineering skills combined with ML expertise.
education_requirements: BS/MS in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field
responsibilities: Build and deploy machine learning pipelines
Design scalable ML infrastructure
Implement feature engineering and data preprocessing
Monitor model performance in production
Collaborate with data scientists to productionize models

title: Research Assistant
description: Join our research team to conduct cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence and machine learning. This position is ideal for someone looking to pursue advanced studies or gain research experience.
education_requirements: BS in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or related field
responsibilities: Conduct literature reviews and research analysis
Assist in designing and implementing experiments
Analyze research data and generate insights
Prepare research reports and publications
Present findings at research meetings and conferences
